member.name: P:UniConverter.My.Resources.Resources.CMDCode_help
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to CMDCode-help V1.2.0.6 (2019-07-10 By MineEric64)
/help - Showing How To Use Command. It shows the Commands to you. /? - Same as '/help' /clear - Clear Text. /del <WName> - Delete File/Directory named <WName>. /exists <WName> - Exists File/Directory named <WName>. Showing As Boolean. <WName> Lists: Workspace, abl_proj (Ableton Project File), sounds, keySound (Sound Mapping File), CoLED (LED Files), keyLED (UniPack LED Files), info (UniPack Information), ksTmp (Tempoary keySound), KeyTracks (LED KeyTr [rest of string was truncated]";.
